# Face-Recognition-System
                          ![My Dashboard](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/118981514/458405576-365a8a46-be66-4b4f-93b6-06b80d3209fc.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTA3NzIyNDYsIm5iZiI6MTc1MDc3MTk0NiwicGF0aCI6Ii8xMTg5ODE1MTQvNDU4NDA1NTc2LTM2NWE4YTQ2LWJlNjYtNGI0Zi05M2I2LTA2YjgwZDMyMDlmYy5wbmc_.xXsMkwrgqlTgeCeS3yMZS52jiYpSWCCdX7EKOlk6hOo)


This is a Face Recognition Attendance System using Python, OpenCV, and face_recognition library.The system uses a camera to capture images of individuals and  Face data is encoded and stored securely using pickle in the databases.
